history.action: üì¶ Sprint 3 Preview (C420) ‚Äî Created docs/product/sprint-3-preview.md. Theme: Platform & Community. reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Pre-decision holding is ideal for forward planning ‚Äî no blockers, frozen specs, time to think strategically. Lesson: Sprint N+1 preview docs during holding patterns reduce kickoff ambiguity and support external communications (accelerators).

history.action: üìã RETRO C411-420 (C421) ‚Äî 10-cycle retrospective covering Go/No-Go prep. 100% success rate (10/10). Key achievements: HeatStore shipped (C413), all T-0 verification protocols (QA/Ops/Design), Sprint 2 contract verified, Sprint 3 Preview created. reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Pre-decision holding enabled productive full rotation with 100% success. Each role found valuable sign-off or prep work. What to improve: 10-cycle retro gap is at threshold ‚Äî should aim for 5 cycles. Lesson: L168 ‚Äî completing full rotation before major decisions ensures every role evaluates readiness from domain expertise, no perspective missed.

history.action: üîç T-6 QA HEALTH CHECK (C422) ‚Äî Full test suite verification at T-6 milestone. Core 815/819 ‚úÖ, CLI ~363 ‚úÖ, TypeCheck ‚úÖ, Lint ‚úÖ (0 errors, 7 warnings stable). reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Daily health checks during T-minus countdown provide objective decision confidence. Lesson: L171 ‚Äî T-N milestone checkpoints (T-7, T-6...) create audit trail showing continuous readiness, not just point-in-time Go/No-Go decisions.
